HYTRADE24

THE BUSINESS PORTAL OF THE HYDRAULICS INDUSTRY

To make it short: You work in the purchasing department and you’re looking for a component or an alternative supplier? Nothing easier than that. On our starting page of our website, you simply share with us exactly WHAT you are looking for, specify the filters that are important to you and we will provide you with all the necessary information about suitable products, services or companies. You immediately have the opportunity to make targeted or collected inquiries and receive feedback with offers in a short time. You save time, work and research effort, can select the offer that suits you... and all this from your desk, on the go with your smartphone or tablet and without having to call dozens of companies afterwards. We simplify your working life!

The concept is similar on the other side of the desk. You work in the sales department and would like to bring your product to the customers? Good idea! That's where we can help! Set up your company under the keywords and categories relevant to you in our business directory, link with existing or newly created products and let interested people find you, who may soon be your customers. You will quickly and easily receive inquiries about your products and services and can immediately submit offers - whether stationary from your office or mobile via smartphone or tablet from the train. Always be informed when the customer is looking for your product. A trade relationship cannot be established more quickly and simply.

Are you looking for alternative products or suppliers? This is very easy! You need service X up to date Y at price Z? Ask us! The possibilities are so various that you have to try it to believe it!


Here you will find the most important information on the individual portal areas:

  • Marketplace
  • Vendor
  • Leads
  • Events
  • Blog
  • Jobs
  • Groups

 

Marketplace & Product catalogue

Browse the components and services of our suppliers

One of the most important aspects of hytrade24 is the product catalogue. Where various marketplaces reach their limits, the attention to detail of our product catalogue only begins. Where others require you to limit the properties of your products to "size", you can rely on hytrade24 to ensure that "displacement", "operating pressure" or "flange type" are not unknown for us.

If you are looking for a special car, you are not satisfied if you have to search for a "metal object". You want more details. This is where we come in. Are you looking for a double-acting cylinder with a certain stroke, a certain piston size and a certain lifting capacity? Simply enter these details and we will show you the products that meet these requirements and the companies that can potentially supply this product. Request - done!

You offer a special product which is not available in the product catalogue? Put it on our website by yourself or contact us. We can do that!

Whether you use a detailed search via the extensive filter function, a full text search with free search terms or any other method, there are endless possibilities. And once the product you are looking for has been found, numerous additional materials can be added here by the adjuster or by other users, starting from your own product photos to technical drawings, PDFs, STEP files or CAD data... even product videos or tutorials are possible.

As you can see, there's a lot going on!

 

Vendor & Yellow Pages

Find the right partners for your project or present your company

The hytrade24 yellow pages are one of the most important and valuable tools that our business portal has to offer.

In this area, companies present themselves sorted according to their core competence, making them easy for everyone to find. Do you offer manual control valves, gear pumps or manufacture hydraulic cylinders? Are you active in the field of component manufacturing, distribution, OEM, services? Let the industry know and you will be noticed as a professional among professionals!

By the intuitive and extensive filter functions the exact companies can be found who offer the product, the service or the know-how required. An inquiry can be made immediately and the communication starts rolling! Fast, uncomplicated and comfortable.

In addition, you can create a detailed company portrait, specify personal contact persons for user-defined topics and thus optimize work processes in purchasing, sales and project planning. Unbeatably practical - or do you have time to give away?

 

Leads & Requests

Inquiries, requests, offers - Leads are our currency in communication.

No matter whether you place requests as a buyer for a special product or send an offer as a supplier for a customer inquiry - communications at hytrade24 are handled by so-called "leads".

With the help of the leads available to you, you can control which transactions you initiate on our portal or which business relationships you wish to enter into.

The lead database contains all requests already published on hytrade24 - and as a vendor you can send your offers immediately. As a buyer, you can submit requests or directly ask suppliers about the products and services you have posted - quickly and easily.

You decide who receives your request. You want to contact a special vendor - for sure! You would like to send a collective request to 20 providers - go ahead! As long as your lead account is "covered", nothing will stand in the way of contacting you.

All this will be organized about your projects. Projects are the control centre of your communication. You have to configure a power unit - create the project "power unit" and add individual leads for pump, tank, engine etc., complete with budget management and deadlines. Never before have you been able to implement your plans in such a structured and simple way - and just wait and see how practical it can be to share your projects or individual leads with colleagues or forward tasks to them. Productivity and efficiency - all under one virtual roof.

 

Events & Dates

Share important dates with your partners, customers and leads

Surely you have some plans - exhibitions, presentations, conferences. Let your customers and partners know where you can be found, when your products can be seen live or what exhibition you will be attending.

Our event calendar makes it possible! Whether it's a leading international trade fair or an internal company anniversary with an open day - organise and publish your dates easily on our event calendar and benefit from the fact that the industry reads along here.

In this way, you will achieve a better number of visitors, increase your own importance and can compare appointments with other portal members quickly and easily.

 

Blog & Company News

We offer your company a platform - with the topics that concern YOU!

In a dedicated area, you can communicate the latest developments and news from your company to a professional public. In this way, you are guaranteed to reach the target audience.

To be the central contact point for all news from mechanical engineering (and especially from the field of hydraulics) - that is the big goal of our blog area. The published articles are provided by our customers and editorially supervised and maintained by us. This guarantees that your readership will find a consistently high level of content and will always be up to date.

Besides that, you can have all your messages displayed on your company page in your own blog, which allows you firstly to present your collected postings to interested readers and secondly to make your company appearance on hytrade24 more interesting and comprehensive.

Show who you are and what you do!

 

Job Market

Good staff is hard to find - we make it a little easier for you

The best specialists, the most skilled employees, the most creative minds - you want them, we will find them! On hytrade24 you can publish specific job offers for skilled people. The highlight: the job exchange can also be searched by non-members of the portal, so experts from external areas can also see your request here.

You will find university graduates, freelancers, technicians, service specialists and much more with great precision - because the job market of a technically oriented business portal is mainly frequented by a qualified group of people

In this way, you can not only increase or optimise your company's staff, your company is also strengthened in public and industry recognition.

 

Groups & Community

Together you can achieve more - and we make community possible.

For us, community means more than just "many people in one place". We offer our customers the opportunity to exchange ideas at a high professional level. Discussing current developments together, exchanging industry news or simply talking about the virtual garden fence - that's part of it!

To support this concept, we rely on an industry-specific user forum in which questions can be asked and where answers can be given. Show your customers that you have the necessary competence to be able to help in case of questions.

In addition, we offer you the opportunity to offer your customers a live chat in order to directly exchange information with your interested parties for direct consultations or online discussions.

After all, we believe that personal contact is still the best basis for negotiation and trade. That is why we regularly organise networking events or workshops for our customers or offer the possibility of casual get-togethers - how often the really important decisions were made after working together with a beer!
